text_block_list.text: Marv~elous☆★☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
It was the day of the Selection race we had been preparing for. 
Marvelous Sunday seemed to be in top condition.

Even though I was just helping, I still felt excited. 
There was something I wanted to tell her after the race was over.

Everyone's nervousness, excitement, and passion! As I 
thought, races are Marvelous☆ Today feels like it'll 
be the beginning of something amazingly Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, there she goes again. 
Hello~, we're the Impromptu Cheer Squad~.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
Yaho- Marve-chin! How're you feeling? 
Feeling Marvelous today too?
text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun

text_block_list.text:
Of course! Maya, Nature, and Laurel too, make sure you don't 
miss a thing! I'll show you a special kind of Marvelous today☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, I wouldn't take my eyes off of my cute rival. 
So make sure you show us a wonderful Marve-chan-like race♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
……Looks like you're feeling fine, so I'm a little relieved. 
And you haven't been collapsing lately, good job.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
That's because I've had Trainer with me! They've been helping 
me get prepared to show everyone this special Marvelous!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
All of it's been for the sake of today's Marvelous☆ I want 
to show everyone the greatest Marvelous as soon as I can!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
I heard a voice urging the participants to gather 
at the gate. I told her to do her best out there――
Thanks Trainer! Ah, but before that――
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: I'm going to the bathroom!!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
That timing, right before a race, seemed quite whimsical. 
I guess she wasn't feeling too nervous……maybe.

Under a clear sky, the Uma Musume run towards their 
dream in their debut, a selection race, 2200m on turf!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
The next generation. What kind of race will 
these 12 Uma Musume show us? And they now――Start!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
The leading group formed quickly. Marvelous Sunday 
takes up the rear…… is she conserving her strength?
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
(Ragged breath, the pressure is making my 
skin tingle! As I thought, races are amazing, 
there are so many Marvelous things☆★☆)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(I want to let loose……but I can't yet. Trainer 
taught me……it's important to be patient too)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Eeeh, Marve-chin, what's wrong!? 
She's not going zoooom like usual!?
text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun

text_block_list.text:
She even said she was feeling fine. 
Maybe her stamina's……?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text:
But she's not falling behind, she's properly keeping up. 
Maybe, she's got something in mind.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
But like Sakura Laurel said, this was her strategy. 
Conserve your energy for the early stages, and then――

All 12 gather as they round the 3rd corner. 
The front group seems to be close together, 
could this be a tough spot for those in the back!?
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Marve-chin~~!! You can still do it~~!!
text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun

text_block_list.text: Goooo~~ Don't lose~~!!
text_block_list.name: Nature&Laurel

text_block_list.text:
(Ahaa, Mayano and the others' voices. 
……cheering is something Marvelous……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(Now, running together with everyone, the smell of the 
turf, the beating of my heart, it's all……all so Marvelous……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(Why does it feel so great……!? I'm not alone……
everyone's here……it's all sparkling brightly……)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(But this isn't enough, further ahead is that special Marvelous! 
So I could show everyone that, up until today――)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
You'll help me with training!? If you do, 
will I be able to show that special Marvelous to everyone!?
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: 『You'll be able to for sure!』

It just feels like that Marvelous feeling keeps building up☆ 
If I keep on building this up more and more then――
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: 『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』
『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』

(Trainer is supporting me in helping spread 
this Marvelous feeling! When we're together, 
the excitement and surprises just keep coming!)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(This feeling that seems like it'll burst, all of it, 
all of it, was for this moment……that's why I will――)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: Right here, to everyone――Haaaaaaaa――!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Breaking through the crowd――Marvelous Sunday pushes through! 
With her red ribbon fluttering, she closes with the front!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Marvelous Sunday claws her way to the front! 
Will she make it, will she make it, the winner is――
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa……everyone's smiles are so bright……! I wonder if 
they felt it? That feeling right now is Marvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
(As I thought, this is it! I can reach them……! They still haven't 
realized it, but this world is overflowing with Marvelous――)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text: (If I'm together with them, then……!!)
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Marve-chin~!! Amazing, amazing, you did it! 
Maya, I was excited all the way to the end, you know!
text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun

text_block_list.text:
Even though you were bad at pacing before. To think 
you'd learn to hold back on moving forward this 
much……looks like I can't just rest on my laurels!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, that was better than I expected, Marvelous Sunday. 
She'll definitely get better and better from here on――!
text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I'd heard she had a frail body, but I wonder if that's not 
the case anymore. If she's managed properly, then maybe――
text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B

text_block_list.text:
Hyaa~~ already basking in the spotlight, huh? Looks like 
things are looking rosy for you so……what're you gonna do?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: I won't do anything! After all, I've already made up my mind☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Did ya see that, Trainer!? The moment I showed everyone 
Marvelous! An exciting, heart-thumping, amazing Marvelous☆
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
But, this isn't enough. Besides, this is only 
the beginner Marvelous☆ In the racing world, 
there's definitely a more wonderful Marvelous★
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
If I'm with Trainer, I think I can reach it! 
So, please, together with me, help me show them Marvelous!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
So it reaches far and wide――I want the world to 
know that Marvelous is all around us……that's why――!
text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday

text_block_list.text:
Of course, I had already decided. I wanted to keep 
supporting her, helping her spread the Marvelous word.

She wanted everyone to know that wonderful 
surprises were all around. I wanted to help 
someone with such a wholesome wish. That's why――

And so, the days of conveying that ideal with the 
super-positive Uma Musume, Marvelous Sunday, began――!
